Posts.Content: Letubu2 wrote: Hello, I have been diagnosed with stage III A , grade lll. ILC breast cancer. I have my bone scan next Friday. I'm wondering if joint pain could be bone cancer? I don't have stiffness just knees & elbows pain??? Already had right mastectomy. 4 out of my 6 nodes were Micro scopic positive . I'm so scared it spread to my bones??? Starting chemo May 20th. Thank you for any advice you can give me . Log in to post a reply
